body.name: Evenflo Sonus Convertible Car Seat, Lava Red
body.stockDetail: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
features: VERSATILE: The Sonus Convertible Car Seat helps protect rear facing infants from 5-40 pounds, and forward facing toddlers from 22-50 pounds, extending the life and use of this full-featured car seat. Rear facing height is 19-40 inches and forward facing height is 28-50 inches

TESTED & TRUSTED: In addition to meeting or exceeding all applicable federal safety standards, this car seat also passes Evenflo's comprehensive Side Impact and industry leading Rollover Test Standards.Age: At least 2 years old,Fit: The tops of the child’s ears are at or below the top of child restraint seat back

ALL-SEASON COMFORT: The Sonus features a revolutionary air flow ventilation system that provides a temperature-regulated, comfortable traveling experience regardless of the season or your climate. Rear facing fit tip- Top of head is at 1 inch below the top of the child restraint seat back
TRAVEL WITH FREEDOM: This restraint meets FAA Inversion requirements for airplane use allowing it to serve as a seat that can travel with you during family vacations or holidays around the world
OTHER VALUABLE FEATURES: Up-front adjustment for easy access to harness, 5 shoulder strap positions for proper fit, removable pads for easy machine washing, 2 cup holders, and head pillow for support
body.description: Keep your growing child safe and comfortable in Evenflo's Sonus convertible car seat. With a rear-facing weight rating up to 40 pounds and a forward-facing weight rating up to 50 pounds. your child can remain harnessed longer. For added comfort, this seat offers a built-in ventilation system that provides a comfortable seat for your child through all seasons. Try this seat for a top notch extended-use option at an affordable price. At Evenflo, we continue to go above and beyond government standards. Designed and tested for structural integrity at energy levels approximately 2x the federal crash test standard AND tested to simulate a side impact event and rollover event.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 225 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #16,768 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #50 in Convertible Child Safety Car Seats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was purchased during price reduction. Love the red color. This is a good sturdy seat with side protection. Easy to adjust straps. Cup holder doesn't take up alot of space but functions with the strap. Although my 2 year old grandson cannot put it back in the holder after he removes it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good purchase for the value
reviews.reviewText: This was an amazing purchase. Got the red and gray and it looks really good and also is very spacious for my 30lb 3 year old. I love the ability to have it rear faced for long trips so that he can fall asleep in it and move it to front facing when needed. The seat belt is hard enough for a 3 year old to unbuckle which I love. It has two cupholders that are very slick. very easy to install and all in all a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for tall toddlers!
reviews.reviewText: I own a small 5 passenger SUV and have a 3 year old toddler who is 42 inches tall. We had previously purchased the Graco Nautilus thinking this would be our final car-seat. The moment we began to use that car-seat, whenever my son would fall asleep in the car, his head would fall forward to his chest. This would really irk me as it looked so uncomfortable. I began to research once again and stumbled upon the SONuS -- it meets our needs! We love it and my son is much more comfortable when napping. I have just added cushioned pads to his straps and we're set. One CON: the middle seat belt clasp that is supposed to hit at the armpit does not slide up and down so gently when I am wanting to readjust it on my toddler's body, but this could just be my product, and likely not such a major con.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Good for what we paid. Daughter grew right out of the britax we had, and we spent so much on that infant seat we decided to go with something more economical this time around. She loves the extra space and the cup holders are convenient. It does have a couple of downsides, though. It is much better forward facing. It isn't as secure when rear facing because the top cannot anchor unless you wrap the top strap around the passenger seat. It was also an absolute bear to install - I scuffed and bruised my hands trying to get the strap through the back, and it is hard to secure it tightly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I had to do research.
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this seat. I got it for my aunt to take my three year old to preschool. She couldn’t work it to save her life. It ended up in my car. I did research on how to work it and if I needed to get a new one. Turns out it’s safe and is work-able once the continuous strap was explained to me and I moved the crotch buckle up. I’m still struggling to get the prefect harness fit for my 3 year old but it is growing on me. I haven’t decided if I’m going to get one that isn’t a science project or not just yet. The price is good and from what I can tell it is safe, so I wouldn’t say don’t buy it. Just expect to put some effort in. If price point isn’t a concern for you, for sure go for another seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, clean, and use
reviews.reviewText: When I bought this I was worried it would be hard to install because of the reviews but iy took 5 minutes and it fit great in my tint nissan versa note. Its soft and comfortable and looks great. And my picky toddler who hates the car doesnt freak out when i put him in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best budget option out there
reviews.reviewText: Seems solidly built and very good padding. We installed backwards facing and had enough space up front. Installation was a breeze. This is probably the best budget option out there. We use in grandma's car and it's much much better than the cosco scenera which was a bit cheaper but uncomfortable for our large baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'll be flying solo with a 2yr old and I have no doubt we will be just fine. Somehow I like it better than my huge ...
reviews.reviewText: Very lightweight. I'll be flying solo with a 2yr old and I have no doubt we will be just fine. Somehow I like it better than my huge evenflo one.
Great car seat for the price. We bought it for our 2 year old, and she feels comfortable in this seat. Easy to install and use.
Very good product.. my baby is super comfortable in this car seat. Its very light weight for lifting. And the product looks so good too.

My son loves riding in this car seat! Our family members absolutely love it! It’s easy to get in and out of the car regularly. The reason why I put 4 stars is because if my son falls asleep in the car seat, his head flops around and ends up resting awkwardly on his chest/shoulder somehow, which is not a safe position for breathing. Luckily it does not happen often and I will not allow him to sleep in the car seat!

Everything was easy to install but when using rear facing, we had to use the seatbelt as the hooks cannot reach for the anchor system. I perfer the anchoring system. I love that when it is cold the seat is not affected. The seat is well positioned that my baby's head can lean with comfort rather than nodding into an uncomfortable position. Easy to buckle my baby in, much quicker than our old peg perago. Also pretty light, I was able to install and carry the seat without my husband's help.

reviews.reviewerName: Mr. Richard M. HelmsMr. Richard M. Helms
reviews.reviewTitle: Finally a use for the back seat of a Camaro
reviews.reviewText: We have twin 4 year old grandsons. I bought two of these seats for the back seat of my 2012 Camaro. Now the reality is we never use the back seat as it is not very large but the child seats fit beautifully and the kids love riding in the big yellow car. As you can see from the picture they fit like a charm and look great. Finally a use for the back seat of a sports car. :-)
